org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

类 TransientBlobCleanupTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.blob.TransientBlobCleanupTask
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class TransientBlobCleanupTask
extends java.util.TimerTask
    Cleanup task for transient BLOBs.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<Tuple2<JobID,TransientBlobKey>,java.lang.Long> blobExpiryTimes
      Map to store the TTL of each element stored in the local storage.
      private org.slf4j.Logger log
      The log object used for debugging.
      private java.io.File storageDir
      Local storage directory to work on.
      private java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock writeLock
      Lock to acquire before changing file contents.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TransientBlobCleanupTask(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<Tuple2<JobID,TransientBlobKey>,java.lang.Long> blobExpiryTimes, java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock writeLock, java.io.File storageDir, org.slf4j.Logger log)
      Creates a new cleanup timer task working with the given parameters from BlobServer and TransientBlobCache.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void run()
      Cleans up transient BLOBs whose TTL is up, tolerating that files do not exist (anymore).

        private java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<Tuple2<JobID,TransientBlobKey>,java.lang.Long> blobExpiryTimes

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TransientBlobCleanupTask

        TransientBlobCleanupTask(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<Tuple2<JobID,TransientBlobKey>,java.lang.Long> blobExpiryTimes,
                         java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock writeLock,
                         java.io.File storageDir,
                         org.slf4j.Logger log)
        Creates a new cleanup timer task working with the given parameters from BlobServer and TransientBlobCache.
        参数:
        blobExpiryTimes - map to store the TTL of each element stored in the local storage
        writeLock - lock to acquire before changing file contents
        storageDir - local storage directory to work on
        log - logger instance for debugging

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Cleans up transient BLOBs whose TTL is up, tolerating that files do not exist (anymore).
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
        指定者:
        run 在类中 java.util.TimerTask
